examples.text: Дул ьеж биранда, а ил ьел бара.

translation.en: I will do this, and you do that.
translation.ru: Я сделаю это, а ты сделай то.

translation.en: It doesn't bother me what you do.
I did not know father is not home.
translation.ru: Я не знал, что отец не дома.

translation.en: If it doesn't work here, will it there?
Tell to the absent ones too.
Don't come when mother is not home there.
translation.ru: Не приходи когда мама не дома.

translation.en: No one helped except for brother.
Navigated the conversation to where was needed.
didn't let him even make a sound
Do you realy have a brother?

examples.text: уба ҡил рел раал ду ра цянда

translation.en: if mother is still at home i will come too

examples.text: убацци ҳар веға, абаал аттаса вя

oh for how long did she stay
father didn't let me go there
eat just the soup (e.g. without bread)
don't sit on the very edge
the car is about to break
*at critical state, in need of help
she's owner of a beautiful name

examples.text: ьана ьеж баьласар ьясив бирул да

translation.en: now i'm trying it for the first time
i was not at home today
sort things out with your son
i don't need that at all

examples.text: атта вел воьал ду ра цянда

translation.en: if father is still there i will come too
go home before you caught cold
go eat while there's food left

if you're bored go scatter flour

examples.text: дуцци ци биккул де йа и?

my brother is attracted to cars

examples.text: коцци йа ьел риҡна да рикьон

examples.text: ниҳола ғайли цигле бикьор ей ьел?

despite it being so it didn't work
while he was little he stayed in the village

examples.text: атта ҡил вилле уцци ра цяун

how great mother would do it
collect the crumbs on the table
may his estate not be of benefit to him
all that i was selling was sold
the site was shining with the flowers
let everyone bring their own tool
it's not worthy for you to say this

examples.text: шилцци яьле це шаьарцци гон аккол

i'll do it as soon as mother tells
will finish in about an hour
in the past there were wolfes in the forest
to go to toiled to pee
if was needed should have gone
i am fed up with you

examples.text: ижин кигара еттен вярун яьле аччу у?

translation.en: wouldn't it been better to go than to sit here?

examples.text: явра аулши, илдеҳна зарал ра калгун

translation.en: didn't work a lot therefore stayed healthy

examples.text: ьеж баццецци имцьа гон миркне ди де

translation.en: this months it was raining mostly

examples.text: имцьа дяьне никьна бирццул це, цацате бирццул акку

to lie down after the rain
haven't seen him for a while
should i give this? give the other
for the sake of god leave me

get over everyone to inform about it
no way i will do this
it doesn't seem expensive to me
even if it snows it's still the same

may your every step be blessed

examples.text: рицци царағив ҡҡел ду ра цағивда

i came home as my brother is ill
he did it since he wanted to

wood moth will eat stingy one's wealth

examples.text: ду улшан се и ра улше

examples.text: тамаччу бурха катьун авяяж хула киццара
